Administration.text:
Type:
Antifungal
Dosage Forms:
Routes of Administration: Intravenous
Common Trade Names: Mycamine

Adult_Dosing.text:
Candidiasis
or
aspergillosis
treatment: 50-150mg IV daily
Antifungal prophylaxis: 1mg/kg IV daily

Special_Populations.text:

: C
Lactation risk
: Infant risk cannot be ruled out
Renal dosing: no adjustment
Hepatic dosing: no adjustment

Acute renal failure
